name: mu
greetingText: I know you thought I forgot, but I didn't! :)
wishText: Mere pass koi achi photo nahi thi so! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I know we have our ups and downs Aur kuch din se touch me nai thee   but i will be always with you <3.
replayText: ps:me Birthday nahi bhulta unlike some people.
